Aflatoxin    The risk of developing liver cancer may be increased by eating foods that contain aflatoxin (poison from a fungus that can grow on foods, such as grains and nuts, that have not been stored properly).
                
                
                    The following protective factor may decrease the risk of liver cancer:
                    Hepatitis B vaccine    Preve
